english.segment1: When the music fades. And all is stripped away. And I simply come. Longing just to bring. Something that's of worth. That will bless your heart
english.segment2: I'll bring You more than a song. For a song in itself. Is not what You have required. You search much deeper within. Through the ways things appear. You're looking into my heart
english.segment3: I'm coming back to the heart of worship. And it's all about You. All about You, Jesus. I'm sorry Lord for the thing I've amde it. When it's all about You. It's all about You
english.segment4: King of endless worth. No one could express. How much You deserve. Though I'm weak and poor. All I have is Yours. Every single breath
english.segment5: I'll bring You more than just a song. For a song in itself. Is not what You have required. You search much deeper within. Through the way things appear. You're looking into my heart
